Text:
Thanks for the upload, I desperately needed my first 48-fix!
Still waiting till seasons 3 - 8 pop up, plus the couple episodes from S11&12 whohm I'm still looking for. I'm not complaining at all just putting it out in hopes that someone is already working on them. When I can finally grab them I'll do a mega torrent with all seasons so the newbie collectors have it easy :-)

Thanks for sharing & all your efforts!
